channel.title: Twitter on James Horton
channel.description: Recent content in Twitter on James Horton

item.title: Over clocking my Raspberry Pi cluster
item.description: With my newly created raspberry pi cluster being made out of the Raspberry Pi 2, I don’t want it to lag to far behind the freshly announced Raspberry Pi 3. To try and keep up with the new hardware without replacing all of my Pi’s I devices it was worth a go at overclocking them. Overlooking my Pi’s should allow them to work a bit quicker, but it will reduce power efficient and increase the tempurature that the cluster runs at.
